Cocktail recipe.Name: Alexander
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 코냑의 진한향과 Crème de Cacao의 달달함, Fresh Cream의 부드러움이 섞인 진하고 달달한 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. 모든 재료들을 각얼음이 채워진 칵테일 쉐이커에 붓습니다.
2. 차가운 칵테일 잔에 흔들어 섞습니다.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Sprinkle fresh ground nutmeg on top.
Cocktail recipe.Histoy: 알렉산더 칵테일은 1922년 런던에서 유명한 신부를 기리기 위해 Ciro's Club에서 Herry McElhone에 의해 탄생했습니다. 처음에는 파나마라고 불렸는데, 코냑 대신 진, 다크 대신 라이트 코코아 크림이 사용되었습니다.
Cocktail recipe.Histoy_Eng: The Alexander cocktail was born in London in 1922 by Hery Mc Elhone, at Ciro's Club in honor of a famous bride, at the beginning it was called Panama, Gin was used instead of Cognac and light cocoa cream instead of dark.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Grasshopper
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 알렉산더에서 파생된 칵테일로서 Crème de Menthe에서 상쾌하게 느껴지는 민트의 맛이 일품인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. 얼음이 채워진 쉐이커에 모든 재료를 붓습니다.
2. 몇 초 동안 강하게 흔드세요.
3. 차가운 칵테일 잔에 담으세요.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake briskly for few seconds.
3. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Alexandra
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 알랙산더의 파생된 칵테일로 아이스 코코아 크림에서 나오는 진한 코코아 맛의 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Alexander's Sister
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 알렉산더에서 파생된 칵테일로 코냑의 묵직함과 crème de menthe의 상쾌한 민크향이 어우러져 부드러운 우유에 휘감긴 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Sprinkle fresh ground nutmeg on top.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Alejandro
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 알렉산더에서 파생된 칵테일로 코냑 대신 럼이 들어가 Crème de Cacao과 생크림의 부드럼움을 더욱 잘 느낄 수 있는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Sprinkle fresh ground nutmeg on top.
Cocktail recipe.Histoy_Eng: The Alexander cocktail was born in London in 1922 by Hery Mc Elhone, at Ciro's Club in honor of a famous bride, at the beginning it was called Panama, Gin was used instead of Cognac and light cocoa cream instead of dark.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Americano
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 캄파리의 쌉쌀함과 스위트 베르무트의 단맛이 탄산을 더하여 식사 전 입맛을 돋구기 좋은 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Mix the ingredients directly in an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
2. Add a splash of Soda Water.
3. Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with half orange slice and a lemon zest.
Cocktail recipe.Histoy_Eng:
The story of the Americano dates back to the second half of the 1800s in Gaspare Campari's bar in Milan. Over the years the cocktail acquires notoriety thanks to some homages from the world of cinema, including James Bond (007 Casino Royale) whose favorite cocktail was, precisely, the Americano. 
The nickname "American" was born when Primo Carnera, a giant Italian boxer, became world heavyweight champion at Madison Square Garden in New York. When Carnera returned to Italy with the title, he was greeted with this very Italian cocktail which, for the occasion, was called "Americano". 
The Americano entered the IBA Cocktail List only in 1987 but, in reality, it was a cocktail that spread all over Italy during the 1930s.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Angel Face
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 진, 칼바도스, 살구 브렌디를 얼음과 함께 차갑게 쉐이킹한 칵테일로 칼바도스와 에프리콧 브랜디의 산뜻한 과일항이 일품인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Histoy_Eng: Although the origin of the cocktail is not known, the main hypotheses assume that it was born in the twenties of the twentieth century in France: this thesis would prove the presence of calvados, a liqueur commonly used in France and, in particular, in that period, as an epidemic of phylloxera in European vineyards had limited the production of brandy. On this basis, one of the most frequent hypotheses has it that the cocktail was created by Harry MacElhone, founder of Harry's New York Bar in Paris on July 19, 1919, in honor of the celebrations for the victory of the First World War. The first reliable evidence, however, dates back to 1930 when Harry Craddock included the Angel Face among the recipes of his book "Savoy cocktail book". Some sources indicate that the name derives from that of an American gangster active during Prohibition; less likely the dedication to Rick Blaine, the protagonist of Casablanca played by Humphrey Bogart, as the film follows the first testimonies (1942).

Cocktail recipe.Name: Aviation
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 쏘는 듯한 신맛 아래 잔잔하게 깔리는 은은한 단맛의 무게감이 느껴지며 진과 Crème de Violette의 화려한 향이 잘 어울리는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker.
2. Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Histoy_Eng:
Aviation was created in New York at the Walkick hotel by the head bartender Hugo Ensslin while he was writing his book "Recipes for Mixed Drinks" (1916) one of the last cocktail books published before the start of American Prohibition.
Lately David Wondrich found the aviation recipe in a 1911 magazine, so the recipe is thought to have been born earlier then 1916.
 In his book Ensslin also indicates the type of Gin to be used 'El Bart Gin "and the recipe is made up in addition to gin, with lemon juice, maraschino Luxardo and Creme di Violette.
The recipe is found again in Harry Craddock's 1930 Savoy Cocktail Book but without the Creme de Violette, this probably due to the difficulty of finding the violet cream during the post-war period In the 1960s it was still unavailable and therefore, simply, the basic ingredient of the Aviation cocktail was discontinued and the bartenders definitively gave up the characteristic blue color of the drink.
The IBA proposes it today in its original version with the creme de violette which is now on the market again.  This fragrant ingredient not only gave the mix a sweetly floral taste, but also gave it a beautiful sky blue color.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Barracuda
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 럼 베이스의 칵테일로 허브 리큐르인 갈리아노와 파인애플 주스 라임 주스 탄산이 가미된 프로세코 와인이 한데 어우러져 하와이안 느낌의 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the Prosecco, shake well with ice.
2. strain into chilled highball glass filled with ice and top up with Prosecco.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Pineapple and Cherry, optional mint sprig for additional aroma.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Bee's Knees
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 꿀을 넣은 진 베이스의 칵테일로 꿀 특유의 단맛과 풍미를 느낄 수 있는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Stir honey with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Optionally garnish with a lemon or orange zest.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Bellini
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 톡 쏘는 탄산의 프레스코와 백도 퓨레가 만난 환상적인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour peach puree into the mixing glass with ice, add the Prosecco wine.
2. Stir gently and pour in a chilled flute glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: PUCCINI
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 톡 쏘는 탄산의 프레스코와 감귤 쥬스가 만난 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Fresh Mandarin Orange Juice into mixing glass with ice, add prosecco wine.
2. stir slowly and pour into cold flute glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: ROSSINI
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 톡쏘는 탄산의 프레스코와 딸기 퓨레가 만난 환상의 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Fresh Strawberry Puree into mixing glass with ice, add prosecco wine.
2. stir slowly and pour into cold flute glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: TINTORETTO
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 톡 쏘는 탄산의 프레스코와 석류주스가 만난 환상의 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Fresh Pomegranate Juice. into mixing glass with ice, add prosecco wine.
2. stir slowly and pour into cold flute glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Between the Sheets
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 이불 사이에서라는 이름처럼 자기전 먹기 좋은 칵테일로 부드러운 맛과 뛰어난 향이 특징인 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Black Russian
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 보드카와 커피 리큐르라는 단순한 술들의 만나 풍기는 묵직한 매력의 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
2. Stir gently.

Cocktail recipe.Name: White Russian
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 도수가 강한 블랙 러시안에 생크림이 들어가 카페라떼와 같은 매력을 풍기는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
2. Stir gently.
3. Float fresh cream on the top and stir in slowly.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Bloody Mary
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 토마토주스와 레몬주스 우스터 소스라는 달달하고 새콤한 재료들 사이에 보드카가 들어간 칵테일로 기호에 따라 타바스코 소스, 후추, 샐러리 소금을 추가해 먹는다.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
Stir gently all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, pour into rocks glass. 

 Note : If requested served with ice, pour into highball glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Boulevardier
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 묵직한 매력의 버번 위스키와 화려한 매력의 캄파리, 베르무트가 섞여 달콤하면서도 쌈쌀한 매력을 뽐내는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with orange zest, optionally a lemon zest.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Bramble
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 블루베리위스키인 Crème de Mûr와 진, 레몬주스, 설탕 시럽이 섞인 달달하고도 화려한 향이 매력적인 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: 1. Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the Crème de Mûre, shake well with ice, strain into chilled old fashioned glass filled with crushed ice, then pour the blackberry liqueur (Crème de Mûre) over the top of the drink, in a circular motion.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish optionally with a lemon slice and blackberries.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Brandy Crusta
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 체리 리큐르인 Maraschino Luxardo와 오렌지 리큐르인 큐라소, 레몬주스의 과일향에 브랜드 위스키가 만나 특색있는 맛을 자랑하는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Mix together all ingredients with ice cubes in a mixing glass and strain into prepared slim cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Rub a slice of orange (or lemon) around the rim of the glass and dip it in pulverized white sugar, so that the sugar will adhere to the edge of the glass. Carefully curling place the orange/lemon peel around the inside of the glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Canchanchara
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 쿠바에서 유래된 칵테일로 라임과 럼, 꿀의 중세적인 맛을 자랑하는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Mix honey with water and lime juice and spread the mixture on the bottom and sides of the glass. 
2. Add cracked ice, and then the rum. End by energetically stirring from bottom to top.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Caipirinha
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 사탕수수 리큐르인 카샤샤와 라임, 백설탕이 만난 달달한 매력이 있는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently.
2. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Cachaça.
3. Stir gently to involve ingredients.

Cocktail recipe.Name: CAIPIROSKA
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 카이피라냐에서 파생된 칵테일로 카샤샤 대신 보드카가 들어가 조금 더 묵직한 매력을 자랑하는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently.
2. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Vodka. 
3. Stir gently to involve ingredients.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Casino
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 올드 톰 진과 체리 리큐르, 오렌지 비터의 화려한 과일향을 느낄 수 있는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled rocks glass with ice.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with lemon zest and a maraschino cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Champagne Cocktail
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 탄산주의 대표격인 샴페인과 코냑을 베이스로 만든 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Place the sugar cube with 2 dashes of bitters in a large Champagne glass, add the cognac.
2. Pour gently chilled Champagne.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with orange zest and maraschino cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Clover Club
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 달캴 흰자의 부드럽고 폭신폭신한 질감과 새콤달콤한 과일 음료수와 같은 매력을 풍기는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Corpse Reviver #2
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 압생트의 풍미와 함께 달콤상콤한 맛이 특색인 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain in chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Cosmopolitan
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 크렌베리 주스와 쿠앵트로의 화려한 맛이 일품이 상큼한 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Cuba Libre
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 라임주스와 콜라, 그리고 럼이 은은하게 어우려져 남미 매력이 짙게 풍기는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Daiquiri
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 럼 베이스에 설탕과 라임 주스를 넣은 단순한 매력의 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. In a cocktail shaker add all ingredients.
2. Stir well to dissolve the sugar. Add ice and shake.
3. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Dark 'n' stormy
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 달고 시원한 느낌과 청량감이 풍부하게 느껴지는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: In a highball glass filled with ice pour the ginger beer and top floating with the Rum.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a lime wedge or slice.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Dry Martini
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 희미한 단맛을 제외하면 무미건조하다고 볼 수 있는 신사들의 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with green olives if requested.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Espresso Martini
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 마티니에서 파생된 칵테일로 실제 에소프레소와 커피 리큐르를 넣어 진한 커피의 향을 느낄 수 있는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Fernandito
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 페르넷 블랑카의 진한 허브향과 콜라의 달달함이 만난 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour the Fernet Branca into a double old fashioned glass with ice, fill the glass up with Cola.
2. Gently stir.

Cocktail recipe.Name: French 75
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 달콤 시큼한 맛에 목넘김 후 시원한 청량감을 동시에 느낄 수 있는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all the ingredients, except Champagne, into a shaker.
2. Shake well and strain into a Champagne flute.
3. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

Cocktail recipe.Name: French Connection
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 진한 향을 가진 아마레또와 코냑이 어우러져 매력적이고 화려한 향을 가진 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
2. Stir gently.

Cocktail recipe.Name: French Martini
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 배르무트 대신 라즈베리 리큐르가 들어가고 파인애플 주스까지 합처져 기존의 무미건조한 드라이 마티니보다 훨씬 달달한 매력이 느껴지는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Gin Fizz
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 진고 탄산수가 합쳐지고 레몬 주스와 설탕으로 만든 마치 음료와도 같은 매력이 느껴지는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Shake all ingredients with ice except soda water.
2. Pour into thin tall Tumbler glass, top with a splash soda water.
 Note : Serve without ice.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a lemon slice, optional lemon zest.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Golden Dream
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 식후, 호근 자기 전에 마시기 좋은 부드러운 맛이 특징적인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake briskly for few seconds.
3. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Hanky Panky
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 마티니에서 파생된 칵테일로 마티니에서 허브 리큐르인 페르넷 블랑카가 합쳐진 더욱 향이 화려해진 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well.
2. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Hemingway Special
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 단맛이 전혀 없는 자몽과 라임 특유의 쓴맛과 신맛이 올라오며 굉장히 자극적인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
2. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Horse's Neck
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 가니쉬가 특징적인 진저에일과 코냑의 어우러진 정작한 맛의 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour Cognac and ginger ale directly into a highball glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir gently.
3. If preferred, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a rind of one lemon spiral.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Illegal
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 오버프루프 럼이 들어가 굉장히 강하지만 팔레넘, 데킬라와 체리 리큐르등의 다양한 맛이 어우러지는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into the shaker.
2. Shake vigorously with ice.
3.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, or "on the rocks" in a traditional clay or terracotta mug.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Irish Coffee
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 진짜 커피가 들어가 커피의 향과 생크림의 부드러움 아이리시 위스키가 어우러진 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Warm black coffee is poured into a pre-heated Irish coffee glass.
2. Whiskey and at least one teaspoon of sugar is added and stirred until dissolved.
3. Fresh thick chilled cream is carefully poured over the back of a spoon held just above the surface of the coffee.
4. The layer of cream will float on the coffee without mixing.
5. Plain sugar can be replaced with sugar syrup

Cocktail recipe.Name: John Collins
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 시원한 레몬의 상큼함이 주가 되어 청량한 탄산수에 진이 가미된 느낌을 주는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients directly into a highball filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a lemon slice and maraschino cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Tom Collins
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 상큼한 맛이 아주 시원한 느낌의 칵테일로서향은 강한 레몬향에 이어지는 상쾌한 솔향이 시원한 느낌을 선사하는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients directly into a highball filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a lemon slice and maraschino cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: KIR
Cocktail recipe.Taste: Crème de Cassis와 드라이 화이트 와인이 어우러져 와인의 맛에 따라 맛이 다양하게 갈리는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour Crème de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine.

Cocktail recipe.Name: KIR ROYAL
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 키르에서 파생된 칵테일로 드라이 화이트 와인이 샴페인으로 변경되어 새콤 달콤한 Crème de Cassis와 샴페인의 환상적인 조합이 특징적인 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour Crème de Cassis into glass, top up with champagne.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Last word
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 허브리큐르와 체리 리큐르가 합쳐져 허브의 향이 가미되어 약간 새콤, 달콤하며 날카로운 맛이 특징적인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker.
2. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Lemon Drop Martini
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 오렌지 껍질 리큐르인 트리플 섹과 시트론 보드카가 섞여 시트러스 향이 매력적으로 다가오는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: 1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with sugar rim around the glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Long Island Ice Tea
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 굉장히 많은 베이스 주들이 들어가 한데 어우려저 마치 홍차와 같은 맛을 내는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Add all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Mai-Tai
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 트로피컬 칵테일인 만큼 과일향이 많이 나는 칵테일이지만 럼의 향과 섞여서 달콤상큼한 맛과 강한 알콜맛이 함께 들어와 전반적으로 강한 맛인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
2. Shake and pour into a double rocks glass or a highball glass. 

 * The Martinique molasses rum used by Trader Vic was not an Agricole rum but a type of "rummy" from molasses.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with pineapple spear, mint leaves, and lime peel.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Manhattan
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 베르무트의 향이 두드러지게 나타나며 입 안에서 쌉쌀함과 부드러움이 어우러지는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Margarita
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 라임과 트리플섹 덕분에 새콤달콤 하지만 도수가 꽤 높아 조금은 독한 느낌의 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

Cocktail recipe.Name: Martinez
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 마티니에서 파싱된 칵테일로 체리 리큐르가 들거가서 드랑이한 마티니보다 더욱 달달한 매력을 풍기는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Mary Pickford
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 단맛이 거의 느껴지지 않고 쓴맛이 나는 대표적 칵테일이지만 파인애플 주스가 많이 들어가 향이 그윽하게 풍기는 매력적인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Mimosa
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 스파클링 와인에 오렌지 쥬스의 산미가 추가된 맛으로 부담 없이 즐길 수 있는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1.Pour orange juice into a flute glass and gently pour the sparkling wine.
2. Stir gently.

 Note : Also known as Buck's Fizz.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Mint Julep
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 향긋하고 상쾌한 민트의 향에 달콤하고 부드러운 버번의 맛이 잘 어우러지는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. In Julep Stainless Steel Cup gently muddle the mint with sugar and water.
2. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add the Bourbon and stir well until the cup frosts.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Mojito
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 달달함과 동시에 민트 향을 내면서 씁쓸한 뒷맛이 스쳐가는 나름 입체적인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Mix mint springs with sugar and lime juice.
2. Add splash of soda water and fill the glass with ice.
3. Pour the rum and top with soda water.
4. Light stir to involve all ingredients.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with sprigs of mint and slice of lime.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Monkey Gland
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 진과 암생트가 섞여 향이 풍부하고 화려하게 풍기며 그레나딘 시럽이 많이 들어가 강한 단맛을 즐길 수 있는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Moscow Mule
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 옅은 녹색 빛이 비치는 모습의 은은한 레몬향과 새콤 달콤한 맛이 특징인 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. In a Mule Cup or rocks glass, combine the vodka and ginger beer.
2. Add lime juice and gently stir to involve all ingredients.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Naked and Famous
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 메즈칼에서 오는 스모키, 라임에서 오는 시트러스, 아페롤과 샤르트뢰즈에서 오는 달콤쌉쌀한 허브 맛이 잘 어우러지는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Negroni
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 허브를 잔뜩 머금은 진의 기분 좋은 향기, 자몽같이 달콤 쌉싸름한 캄파리, 달콤한 꽃향기의 스윗 버무스까지. 복잡하면서도 직선적인 맛이 일품인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients directly into a chilled old fashioned glass filled with ice, Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a half orange slice.

Cocktail recipe.Name: New York Sour
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 와인의 쌉싸름한 맛과 묵직한 과일향에 약간의 레몬향과 새콤달콤함이 가해진 느낌의 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into the shaker.
2. Shake vigorously with ice.
3.  Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice.
4. Float the wine on top.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with lemon or orange zest with cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Old Cuban
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 샴페인의 톡쏘는 탄산과 민트 라임의 조화가 남미의 풍미를 짙하게 끌어 올리는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled elegant cocktail glass.
2. Top up with the sparkling wine.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Old Fashioned
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 아메리칸 위스키의 바닐라 향과 오크향, 그리고 비터의 쓴 맛이 느껴지지만 시간이 지날 수록 설탕이 용해 되면서 다양한 맛을 즐길 수 있는 매력적인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitter, add few dashes of plain water.
2. Muddle until dissolved.
3. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.
4. Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with an orange slice or zest, and a cocktail cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Paloma
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 테킬라의 알싸함과 자몽의 상큼함 그리고 청량감까지 느낄 수 있고 소금이 주는 끝의 짠맛까지, 어디하나 흠잡을 곳이 없는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Poor the tequila into a highball glass, squeeze the lime juice.
2. Add ice and salt, fill up pink grapefruit soda.
3. Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a slice of lime.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Paper Plane
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 산뜻하고 상큼한 레몬과 오렌지 껍질의 향이 강하게 느껴지며 새콤 쌉쌀한 트로피컬한 맛이 또렷하게 드러나는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Paradise
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 살구 브랜디의 살구향과 새콤달콤한 맛이 진의 드라이한 맛을 중화시켜주어 식전주로 애용되는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Penicillin
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 적당한 레몬의 상큼한 맛과 스카치위스키와 꿀의 단맛이 아주 적절한 조화를 이루고 있는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Muddle fresh ginger in a shaker and add the remaining ingredients, except for the Islay single malt whiskey.
2. Fill the shaker with ice and shake.
3. Double-strain into a chilled old fashioned glass with ice.
4. Float the single malt whisky on top.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Pina Colada
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 럼 특유의 향과 코코넛 밀크의 달콤함과 부드러움 파인애플 주스의 달콤함이 합쳐져 음료와 같은 매력을 뽐내지만 도수가 결코 낮지 않으니 조심해야하는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Blend all the ingredients with ice in an electric blender, pour into a large glass, and serve with straws. 

 Note : Historically a few drops of fresh lime juice were added to taste.
4 slices of fresh pineapple can be used instead of juice
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a slice of pineapple with a cocktail cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Pisco Sour
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 포도 브랜디인 피스코 베이스의 칵테일로 새콤달콤한 맛에 마치 음료와 같지만 목넘김 이후 강력한 도수가 찌르듯이 올라오는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled goblet glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Few dashes of Amargo bitters on top as an aromatic garnish.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Planter's Punch
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 럼 베이스의 사탕수수 음료가 들어가 탈콤한 음료수로 정말 많은 바리에이션을 시도해볼 수 있는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients directly in a small tumbler or a typical terracotta glass.

NOTE : Add dilution up to taste, it can be given by water, ice or fresh juices.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Porto Flip
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 계란 노른자가 들어가 약간의 고소한 맛이 있고 약간의 비린 맛은 가니쉬의 넛맥이 잡아주는 계란 노른자로 시도해볼 수 있는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Ramos Fizz
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 크림과 게란 흰자가 들어가 굉장히 폭신하고 단맛이 나는 마치 기분 좋은 요거트를 먹는 기분이 드는 듯한 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients except soda water in a cocktail shaker with ice, Shake for two minutes, double strain in a glass, pour the drink back in the shaker, and hard shake without ice for one minute.
2. Strain into a highball glass, top up with soda.

NOTE : The drink was invented by Henry Ramos in 1888, at his bar Meyer's Table d'Hôtel Internationale in New Orleans.
 The Ramos Fizz was originally shaken for 12 minutes by a crew of 30 bartenders who passed the shaker from one to another.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Russian Spring Punch
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 레몬 새콤한 맛과 카시스의 짙은 풍미에 스파클링 와인의 탄산을 가미한 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the sparkling wine, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled tall tumbler glass filled with ice, and top up with sparkling wine.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with blackberries and optionally a lemon slice as well.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Rusty Nail
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 위스키의 강한 맛과 벌꿀의 단맛, 허브의 스파이시한맛이 어우러져 식후 음료로 자주 즐기는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Sazerac
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 코냑의 짙은 풍미에 압생트의 향이 가미되어 압생트를 좋아하는 사람이 가장 좋아하는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside.
2. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice in a mixing glass.
3. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, strain the mixed drink into the glass.

NOTE: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, Rye Whiskey substituted Cognac as it became hard to obtain.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Sea Breeze
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 크랜베리 주스의 맛과 자몽 주스의 맛이 지배적인 칵테일로 굉장히 트로피컬한 매력을 풍기는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with orange zest and cherry

Cocktail recipe.Name: Sex on the Beach
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 야한 이름의 술은 달콤함 뒤에 강한 도수가 숨겨저 있다는 말처럼 전체적으로 굉장히 달콤한 맛에 강력한 도수가 숨겨져 있는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a half orange slice.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Sidecar
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 오랜지 껍질 리큐르인 트리플 섹과 레몬 쥬스의 날카로운 새콤한 맛이 향긋한 코냑과 어우러진 굉장히 매력적인 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Singapore Sling
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 상큼하고 달콤한 재로들이 많이 들어가 새콤달콤한 맛이 주를 이루는 음료와도 같은 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake well.
3. Strain into Hurricane glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with pineapple and maraschino cherry

Cocktail recipe.Name: Spicy Fifty
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 보드카 바닐라의 달콤한 맛을 내면서도, 마지막은 미묘한 칠리 향이 스쳐가며 깔끔한 마무리를 짓는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a red chili pepper

Cocktail recipe.Name: Spritz
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 살구브랜디에 프로세코와 탄산수의 탄산이 환상적으로 만난 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

 NOTE: There are other versions of the Spritz that use Campari, Cynar or Select instead of Aperol.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a slice of orange.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Spritz (ver. Campari
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 살구 브랜디 대신 캄파리가 들어가서 허브향이 더해져 더욱 향을 돋우는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

 NOTE: There are other versions of the Spritz that use Aperol, Cynar or Select instead of Campari.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a slice of orange.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Spritz (ver. Select
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 살구 브랜디 대신 셀렉트가 들어가 향긋하고 달콤한 맛을 느낄수 있는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

 NOTE: There are other versions of the Spritz that use Campari, Cynar or Aperol instead of Select.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a slice of orange.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Spritz (ver. Cynar
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 살구 브랜디 대신 치나가 들어가서 허브 향이 더해져 더욱 향을 돋우는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

 NOTE: There are other versions of the Spritz that use Campari, Select or Aperol instead of Cynar.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a slice of orange.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Stinger
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 화이트 크렘 드 멘테의 톡 쏘는 민트 향과 향기로운 코냑이 조화를 이루는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Suffering Bastard
Cocktail recipe.Taste: "고통받는 자식" 이 술의 제목처럼 숙취에 고생하는 사람에게 해장술로서 딱 맞는 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the ginger beer, shake well with ice, Pour unstrained into a Collins glass or in the original S. Bastard mug and top up with ginger beer.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with mint springs and optionally an orange slice as well.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Tequila Sunrise
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 데킬라 베이스 칵테일로 그레나딘 시럽이 아래에 깔려있는 오랜지 주스의 모습이 정말 아름다운 달콤한 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball glass filled with ice cubes.
2. Add the grenadine syrup to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with half orange slice or an orange zest

Cocktail recipe.Name: Tipperary
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 모든 재료들이 마치 화음처럼 곡물, 과일 및 허브의 향이 어우러지는 듯한 굉장히 조화로운 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a slice of orange.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Tommy's Margarita
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 기존 마가리타의 존재감이 강한 트리플 섹을 제외, 아가베 시럽으로 단 맛을 잡아 만들어 데킬라 본연의 맛을 끌어올린 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: 1. Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Trinidad Sour
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 비터 베이스의 칵테일로 앙고스투라의 허브와 과일향 그리고 레몬의 신맛이 절묘한 균형을 이루는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Tuxedo
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 맛은 옅게 달착지근하다. 소량 들어간 마라스키노 리큐르와 올드톰진이 약간의 감미를 더해주고 있어서, 알코올맛을 살짝 잡아주고 있다. 중후반에는 비터스와 압생트의 쌉싸름함이 다가와서 혀에 쓴맛을 남긴다. 도수도 좀 높고 맛도 쌉쌀한 편이니 상당히 어른스러운 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with cherry and lemon zest

Cocktail recipe.Name: VE.N.TO
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 이탈리아 정신인 그라파에 경의를 표하는 칵테일로 IBA 유일의 그라파 베이스의 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into the shaker.
2. Shake vigorously with ice.
3. Strain into a chilled small tumbler glass filled with ice.

 Notes : *If desired water can be replaced by chamomile infusion in the honey mix.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with lemon zest and white grapes.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Vesper
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 선명하게 존재감을 드러내는 높은 도수와 진, 릴레 블랑의 화려한 꽃 향기와 은은하게 느껴지는 달콤함이 느껴지는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Vieux Carrè
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 달달함이 기본적으로 깔려있지만 은은한 신맛이 깔려있다. 허브향이 짙게 들어가 있지만 계속해서 변화하는 향이 굉장히 매력적인 칵테일.
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with orange zest and maraschino cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Whiskey Sour
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 레몬 주스와 설탕이 재료로 들어가 맛이 무척 부드럽고 조화로운 신맛과 단맛을 느낄 수 있는 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake well
3. Strain into cobbler glass.
4. If served "On the rocks", strain ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice.

NOTE : If egg white is used shake little harder to release and incorporate the foam from the egg white.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish_Eng: Garnish with a half orange slice and maraschino cherry, optionally use orange zest.

Cocktail recipe.Name: White Lady
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 트리플섹과 진이 어우러져 잇지만 레몬의 신선함이 굉장히 잘 느껴저 굉장히 상큼한 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Yellow Bird
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 새콤함이 강하게 들어오지만 갈리아노에 의한 허브향이 첨가된 깔끔한 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Zombie
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 여러 과일주스와 시럽이 들어가지만 오버프루프 럼의 존재감으로 굉장히 도수가 높은 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method_Eng:
1. Add all ingredients into an electric blender with 170 grams of cracked ice.
2. With pulse bottom blend for a few seconds.
3. Serve in a tall tumbler glass.

Note : *Donn's Mix: 2 parts of fresh yellow grapefruit and 1 part of cinnamon syrup
